Today in Gower, it's a quiet scene with 1 ft @ 6s WNW swell and fresh 19 mph NNW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions remain similar with 1 ft @ 5s WNW and light 5 mph NNW winds, still not producing any surf. The day after, the swell stays at 1 ft @ 5s WNW, but winds pick up to 18 mph WNW, keeping it poor. Best: tomorrow.
